name: ORS Approved Visitors List for a Prisoner
description:
A list of Approved Visitors for a Prisoner.
VIS0024 v00.00.01 Last Modified: 20/03/2019

dataset.name: Visitors
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY AS OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER.LAST_NAME AS LAST_NAME, AT_OFFENDER.FIRST_NAME AS FIRST_NAME, AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID AS AGY_LOC_ID, SUBSTR(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION, LENGTH(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.AGY_LOC_ID) + 2, LENGTH(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION)) AS UNIT_DESCRIPTION_4_SHORT, AT_PEOPLE.FIRST_NAME AS CP_FIRST_NAME, AT_PEOPLE.LAST_NAME AS CP_LAST_NAME FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATIONS AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_WING_ESTABLISHMENT, OMS_OWNER.CASELOAD_AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS WING_CASELOAD_SECURITY, OMS_OWNER.PERSONS AT_PEOPLE, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_CONTACT_PERSONS AT_CONTACTS WHERE (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_ID = AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.INTERNAL_LOCATION_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */))) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ('OUT', 'TRN') AND NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.CASELOAD_ID IN ('ADMINC', 'CADM_I', 'MULTI')) AND (AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_WING_ESTABLISHMENT.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_WING_ESTABLISHMENT.AGY_LOC_ID = WING_CASELOAD_SECURITY.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = AT_CONTACTS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+)) AND (AT_PEOPLE.PERSON_ID (+) = AT_CONTACTS.PERSON_ID) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */))) AND (WING_CASELOAD_SECURITY.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */))) AND (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY = (SELECT PRISONER_NUMBER FROM prompt_ /* = #prompt('Enter NOMS Number:','A',,Mono,Free,Not_Persistent,,User:0) */) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND AT_CONTACTS.APPROVED_VISITOR_FLAG = 'Y')), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, LAST_NAME, FIRST_NAME, AGY_LOC_ID, UNIT_DESCRIPTION_4_SHORT, CP_FIRST_NAME, CP_LAST_NAME FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Prisoner Summary
dataset.query: SELECT DISTINCT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, LAST_NAME, FIRST_NAME, LOCATION FROM (SELECT *, AGY_LOC_ID || '-' || UNIT_DESCRIPTION_4_SHORT AS LOCATION FROM ${tableId})
